recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.instructions: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.instructions: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Scrambler
recipes.instructions: While pan heats up to medium, crack 2 eggs into a mixing bowl. Add shredded cheese, chopped green onion, and salt 'n pepper to taste. Mix with and when pan is warm, add mixture to pan. Cook for 5 minutes

recipes.title: Slow Cooker Pork Loin
recipes.instructions: Add pork loin and all ingredients to slow cooker. Make sure lid is secure. Turn slow cooker onto high setting. Cook for 3-4 hours, until internal temperature of pork is 160 degrees fahrenheit.

recipes.title: Morning Coffee
recipes.instructions: Boil a kettle of water. Add instant coffee to tumbler. When water boils, add a cup and a half to tumbler. Top up with 1 cup homogenized milk and enjoy!
